timeline.message: Merge branch 'http-mod' of https://github.com/chamil321/ballerina into grpc_error

timeline.bodyText: Did you check this with lang team? Why do we need the typeId?
timeline.author: chamil321

replies.bodyText:
No, I didn't check with them.
WebSocketException class extends Errorvalue. It returns ErrorValue without setting typeId. Therefore, I had to set the typeId in the module.
replies.author: kalaiyarasiganeshalingam

timeline.bodyText: Unless we trap this error in Ballerina and convert to a error value, I don't think we need to do this here.
timeline.author: rdhananjaya

replies.bodyText:
Had a discussion with @kalaiyarasiganeshalingam and it turned out this exception is mapped to Ballerina distinct error defined here https://github.com/ballerina-platform/ballerina-lang/pull/23896/files#diff-0dc26ba9e7a9ac8f581ee802d2a2338dR21
Hence this change is needed.
replies.author: rdhananjaya
